message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,000. I believe it offers significant value, even exceeding the price for someone who needs what it provides.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $13,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm only willing to pay $8,500 for the product. This is my best offer, considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $8,500 is significantly below its value. I could consider $11,500, which would be a fair compromise.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11,500 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. How about we meet in the middle at $9,500?  This would be a fair price for both of us.
